release.action: Overhaul of the SVN Diff to use multiple threads if required. Command line parameters -threads (default 25) and -concurrency-threshold (default 2000 ms) added.
Upgrade dependency to statcvs-0.2.5-dev which allows for extra reports to be integrated.
Patch to fix issue:running tests doesn't work because writing to /root/.statsvn is not allowed.
Adding a counter for the number of diff calls made and to be made, save the cache every 2 minutes (takes 15ms) and provides an estimate for completion time.
